cause.description:
Genocide has been happening since the begining of time. Genocide is when a particular group of people tries to eradicate another group of people. Some examples of this are: hitler in 1939 Israel now darfur now rwanda 1994 The United States only interferes if they will benifit from it. Shouldn't we try to stop it without expecting reward? This is the reason why this cause has been formed. To stop theses crimes against humanity.
1. All countries committing genocide must be FORCED to stop
2. Each country must sign a plan denouncing genocide
3. Have the UN inspect each country every 5 years for genocide
cause.name: Stop genocide all over the world
